snippet: Crime Scene Extra: A murderer is again denied parole and those weighing his release say it is not just the murder but what was done afterward that made them unwilling to release him from prison after 34 years.
abstract: Crime Scene Extra: A murderer is again denied parole and those weighing his release say it is not just the murder but what was done afterward that made them unwilling to release him from prison after 34 years.

headline.main: Parole Denied Again for Killer No Longer Considered Dangerous
